title: Physical Assessment Skills Training for Pharmacy Professional Competency Enhancement: Activity-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: An in-house training program for medical device manufacturers focusing on acquiring physical assessment skills applicable in real clinical settings

learning_goals: Learners can accurately understand the proper use of a stethoscope and perform manual blood pressure measurement procedures with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can correct blood pressure measurement errors within three attempts through virtual simulations and peer feedback.
Learners can explain the principles of activity-based learning design grounded in Gagné’s Nine Events of Instruction.

resources: Digital Sphygmomanometer, Stethoscope, and Blood Pressure Measurement Simulation App

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
